description: This does exactly what it says it will do. It shows you what buttons are being pressed on your mouse and is very helpful to see if it is your mouse or your software that is the problem. THANK YOU to whomever created this.

It might work well in an X-Window Manager based system but as far as I've seen, it doesn't work at all on wayland unless the KmCaster window is itself on Focus.

Now if you use X.Org you might see some differences, but it definitely wasn't working as I wanted it to, on Wayland.
